TEXT: ~[#40E0D0]APPREHENSION.~ NL NL You wake up ~slowly~, rubbing grit out of your eyes.  As you enter your kitchen to make breakfast, you are #y@surprised@ to find it is a #r@mess,@ with dirty pots and utensils strewn about.  On the counter is a mostly eaten plate of stir fry. NL NL "Oh no, not again," you murmur. "I've been sleep wokking."
Enables the Arcanist extended heart kill cutscene.
A few events can be seen by other characters.
Potions that can only be obtained through events.
NL Enemy takes !X2! damage at the start of its turns.
NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !X3! [${ModID}:FireIcon] damage back.
Choose Any Number of Cards to Replace (Blessed Necklace)
